mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.`name`, t.`condition`, t.`column`, t.`value`, t.is_activated ,m.permission AS 'menuPermission' FROM sys_data_permission_rule t INNER JOIN sys_data_permission_rule_role fr ON t.id = fr.data_permission_rule_id INNER JOIN sys_menu m ON m.id = fr.menu_id WHERE t.is_activated = 1 AND fr.role_id IN (SELECT role_id FROM sys_users_roles WHERE user_id = #{userId})
